get.summary:
Retrieve presence analytics statistics.
Access Group: wifi

schema.title: WiFi Analytics Statistics
schema.description: Retrieve statistics for presence analytics.

vs.description: The version number of the sensor message.
vs.title: Sensor Message Version

sq.description: Sequence number - running count of messages from this sensor (resets to 0 if sensor turns off).
sq.title: Sequence Number

si.description: Station ID of the detected device. Encrypted (using a shared key) or hashed.
si.title: Station ID

bi.description: BSSID associated with the device. Encrypted (using a shared key) or hashed.
bi.title: BSSID

sm.description: Station OUI (Organizationally Unique Identifier, or manufacturer ID).
sm.title: Station OUI

ap.description: Set to a non-zero value if this is a FortiAP.
ap.title: FortiAP

cn.description: Count of frames summarized in this message for this device.
cn.title: Frame Count

ot.description: The timestamp of the first frame in this window (Unix time, in seconds).
ot.title: First Frame Timestamp

ct.description: The timestamp of the last frame in this window (Unix time, in seconds).
ct.title: Last Frame Timestamp

cf.description: Frequency of the last frame received.
cf.title: Last Frame Frequency

ss.description: Sum of signal strength; should be a negative number.
ss.title: Sum of Signal Strength

s2.description: Sum of squared signal strength; used to calculate variance.
s2.title: Sum of Squared Signal Strength

s3.description: Sum of cubed signal strength; used to calculate skew.
s3.title: Sum of Cubed Signal Strength

wlan_type.description: The type of wireless network the WLAN is configured as.

vlan_id.title: VLAN ID
vlan_id.description: The VLAN ID the device is assigned.

default_vlan_id.title: Default VLAN ID
default_vlan_id.description: The default VLAN ID assigned to the device.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: mac
parameters.description: WiFi client MAC address.

get.summary:
Return the current WiFi NAC device counts.
Access Group: wifi

schema.title: Matched NAC Device Statistics
schema.description: Retrieve current WiFi matched NAC device counts.

vdom_count.title: VDOM Count
vdom_count.description: Matched NAC device count for the specified VDOM.

total_count.title: Total Matched NAC Devices
total_count.description: Matched NAC device count across all VDOMs.

get.summary:
Retrieve a list of stations and their capability to connect to detected access points.
Access Group: wifi

schema.title: Station Capability
schema.description: Retrieve a list of stations and their capability to connect to detected access points.

items.description: List of stations and their detected access point information.
items.title: Station Capability

band_capability.description: Band capability the station can connect to.
band_capability.title: Band Capability

items.title: FortiAP
items.description: Details for a FortiAP seen by the station.

band_capability.description: Band capability the station can connect to.
band_capability.title: Band Capability

rssi_2g.description: Received Signal Strength Indicator for 2G, with scale from 0 to 127 and 128 being invalid value.
rssi_2g.title: RSSI 2G

rssi_2g_age.description: Age of Received Signal Strength Indicator for 2G, in seconds.
rssi_2g_age.title: RSSI 2G Age

rssi_5g.description: Received Signal Strength Indicator for 5G, with scale from 0 to 127 and 128 being invalid value.
rssi_5g.title: RSSI 5G

rssi_5g_age.description: Age of Received Signal Strength Indicator for 5G, in seconds.
rssi_5g_age.title: RSSI 5G Age

rssi_6g.description: Received Signal Strength Indicator for 6G, with scale from 0 to 127 and 128 being invalid value.
rssi_6g.title: RSSI 6G

rssi_6g_age.description: Age of Received Signal Strength Indicator for 6G, in seconds.
rssi_6g_age.title: RSSI 6G Age
